casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Cleveland Sylvester HARRIS. No. 241P04-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of October 2006 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal in and on Case File Number 74CRS36823":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2007."
